AdGuard DNS Other extensions used: | no option to import settings from non-beta version of Adguard extension; ads from Outlook Live mail (in the form of emails) are not filtered out. One has to manually add to the list, repeat the process up to four times to remove the ad.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.similarweb.com/website/cdnjs.com/#overview](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.similarweb.com%2Fwebsite%2Fcdnjs.com%2F%23overview) ### Comment > @jellizaveta @rakleed > As a fix to #148711, only the app-banner has been hidden, so the site design is somewhat broken. > However, this problem can be easily fixed by adding the following rule. I hope you give it a try! > > similarweb.com#%#//scriptlet('remove-class', 'app-banner-parent', 'body') ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/VFdiwLu.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/zf4sIV7.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.55 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese
